title: AI Copyrights, Girl Math, and Blindsides
summary:
Kara and Scott are starting off the new year answering your listener questions! They tackle why more tech people aren't serving in government, whether Prof G AI compensates Kara, and if girl math is a good thing. Plus, a discussion of personal blindsides and New Yearâ€™s resolutions revealed.
